summary: Adds several pieces of Uniquely named gear to fortify Smithing, Alchemy and Speechcraft, in a mostly lore friendly manner.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces Morg's Magical Fortifiers. It adds one new piece of gear and gives two ways to acquire the gear, to better suit different play styles. switching to the new file will cause you to lose the previous items and have to reacquire them.
___________________________________________________________

After finally getting my enchanting to 100 and getting all the perks I downed a potion of fortify Enchanting and quickly enchanted 3 pieces of armor to 28% Fortify Smithing, then later realized since i hadn't had the time to rename them, they were hard to find and remember in my inventory, so i figured I'd just make them in the CK.

This is my first mod though I've fine tuned it slightly for version 1.1, it's very simple, it includes :

Found on Eorlund (Whiterun)
Dwemer Ring of the Forge - 28% Smithing Fortify
Orc Amulet of the Anvil - 28% Smithing Fortify
Eorlund's Smithing Apron - 28% Smithing Fortify

Found on Zaria (Falkreath)
Gardner's Gloves - 28% Alchemy Fortify
Sinderion's Band - 28% Alchemy Fortify
S'drassa's Fang of Elixirs - 28% Alchemy Fortify

Found on Mavin (Riften)
Silvertongue Amulet - 28% Speechcraft Fortify
Orator's Circlet - 28% Spechcraft Fortify (New Item)

In version 1.1 I've lowered the value of these items to 1000g, so they should be easier to pickpocket (70% @ 65 pickpocket with 2 perks) if you chose that version, if you are not the sneaky type, I've added 3 lockboxes with the items and some extra loot. One near the Skyforge (Whiterun), in Grave Concoctions (Falkreath), and Black Briar Manor (Riften). They are all expert chest so they can lockpicked with some time and patience OR i highly recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29979/?]Lock Overhaul[/url], to just smash the locks.

Please download and activate only one version, either the pickpocket or chest version.
